scripts.check: bun run format && bun run lint:fix && bun run typecheck && bun run test
scripts.check:local:
bun run check && (curl -sf http://localhost:5001/health > /dev/null && bun run test:integration || echo '
⚠️  Local server not running. Start with: bun run dev
   Integration tests skipped.
')
scripts.quick-clean: curl -s -X POST http://localhost:4010/api/v2/clone -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"sessionId":"'"$1"'","toolRemoval":"100","thinkingRemoval":"100"}' | node -e "const d=JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync(0,'utf8')); if(d.success){const id=d.outputPath.split('/').pop().replace('.jsonl',''); console.log('claude --dangerously-skip-permissions --resume '+id)}else{console.log('Error: '+(d.error||'unknown'))}"
